title: feat(global-store): integrate local storage for PCB groups visibility
description: Integrates local storage functionality to persist PCB groups visibility settings across sessions.
body: fix #358

title: patch(global-store): set default pcb groups visibility to true
description: Sets the default visibility of PCB groups to true, correcting a previous misconfiguration that could confuse users expecting grouped PCB elements to be visible by default.
body: The default visibility of PCB groups was incorrectly set to false, which could cause confusion for users expecting to see grouped PCB elements by default. This change aligns with common user expectations and typical workflow requirements.

title: chore: update core
description: Updates the version of the tscircuitcore dependency from 0.0.651 to 0.0.659 in package.json

title: Update core and eval and remove schematic-corpus dep

body:
/closes https://github.com/tscircuit/tscircuit/issues/743

/claim #743

title: feat: add schMaxTraceDistance subcircuit prop
description: Adds an optional schMaxTraceDistance property to SubcircuitGroupProps, allowing users to specify the maximum length a trace can span on the schematic.
body:
## Summary
- add optional `schMaxTraceDistance` to `SubcircuitGroupProps`
- document new property and regenerate props references
- test parsing `schMaxTraceDistance`

## Testing

title: add dutycycle to voltagesource
description: Adds a duty cycle property to the VoltageSource component, allowing users to specify the duty cycle as a percentage or a decimal value.

title: import manifold-3d from cdn to not bundle wasm
description: Changes the way manifold-3d is imported by loading it from a CDN instead of bundling the WASM file, which optimizes the build process and reduces the bundle size.

title: add the `source_trace_not_connected_error` to circuit-json
description: Adds the source_trace_not_connected_error to circuit-json to handle cases where traces are not connected to ports correctly.

title: fix: explicit pcb position on components should override the PCB flex layout
description: Fixes the PCB layout behavior to ensure that explicit positions set on components (pcbX and pcbY) take precedence over the automatic flex layout.

title: fix and refactor to use `group.child` to construct the tree and maintain the order of child inside group having `pcbFlex`
description: Fixes the tree construction and child ordering for groups with pcbFlex by utilizing group.child in the PCB layout process.

title: Turn on Schematic MSP Trace Solver
description: Enables the MSP schematic trace solver feature in the circuit simulation environment.

title: Refactor transistor tests, fix MSP overreach (MSP Schematic Routing)
description: Fixes MSP overreach by adjusting maxMspPairDistance and refactoring transistor tests for better coverage.

title: [MSP Schematic Trace Routing] Fix some net labels not being drawn when there's a trace (only draw these net labels if there's a source net or an assigned display name)
description: Fixes net label rendering issue by ensuring labels are drawn only when a source net or assigned display name is present, improving schematic clarity.
body:
- **work in progress, not skipping ports**
- **draw labels even if there's a trace**

title: Fix Missing Net Labels with MSP (match-adapt 03 fix)
description: Fixes missing net label placements in schematic rendering when using the match-adapt feature.

title: Remove Duplicate Netlabels from schDisplayLabel
description: Removes duplicate layered netlabels from schematic display, ensuring that only unique labels are rendered in the schematic view.
body:
- **repro net label issue, improve test**
- **remove duplicate layered netlabels**

title: Fix missing net label placements (regression fix 2/3 for MSP schematic trace routing)
description: Fixes missing net label placements in the MSP schematic trace routing, addressing a regression issue.

title: Fix: NPN transistor emitter incorrectly mapped to collector pin
description: Fixes incorrect mapping of the emitter pin to the collector pin for NPN transistors in the Transistor component.

Ref https://github.com/tscircuit/tscircuit/issues/742

title: Remove shcematic-corpus and related code

body: related to https://github.com/tscircuit/tscircuit/issues/743

title: fix: failing test error in github CI action
description: Fixes failing test error in GitHub CI action by correcting import paths for the createUseComponent function.

title: fix: connection created from the first chip as default when multiple chip are present with connections and no name
description: Fixes the issue where connections are incorrectly assigned to unnamed chips, defaulting to the first chips connection instead.

title: fix: invalid pinLabel fails to render the whole component
description: Fixes rendering failure of the component when invalid pin labels are provided, allowing valid labels to render while excluding invalid ones with warnings.
body: @seveibar Do we need to create a new `schematic_error` type for this something like `schematic_invalid_pin_label`?

title: MSP Schematic Trace Routing Regression fix 1/3 (repro23 failure)
description: Fixes regression in schematic trace routing that caused failures in rendering net labels for jumper connections.

title: Draw reference designators on schematic on top of schematic traces
description: Draws reference designators on schematic above schematic traces to improve visibility and clarity.
body:
Ref #294 
/claim #294

title: Fix Pin Numbering to Follow Counter Clockwise Convention For Opamp With Power
description: Fixes pin numbering for the opamp with power to follow the counter-clockwise convention, correcting the pin assignments for output and power connections.

title: new symbol: square wave
description: Adds a new square wave symbol to the schematic symbols library, completing the boost converter component set.
